HeroHome.text2: In a rapidly changing world, learning alone is no longer enough‚Äîyou need to stand out. H-Platform isn‚Äôt just a learning tool; it's the bridge that turns your dreams into reality.

why.subtitle: We redefine online education with innovation and distinction.
why.value1: Reach out to trainers directly via WhatsApp‚Äîno delays, no waiting.
why.value2: They combine deep knowledge with engaging, interactive teaching styles.
why.value3: With a team of professional trainers who break down complex ideas into fun and simple concepts.

how-work.title: How H-Platform Works
how-work.content1: Explore trending and essential courses. Watch introductory videos to get a quick overview.
how-work.content2: Register easily using Google. A few simple steps are all it takes to set up your profile.
how-work.content3: Contact our team directly to reserve your place and join the course of your choice.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.content1: H-Platform is an intelligent learning platform designed to develop skills and connect learners with real-world opportunities through interactive content and personalized training.
FAQ.questions2: Can I try H-Platform for free?
FAQ.content2: Yes! You can try free lessons from any course before subscribing.
FAQ.questions3: How can I register on H-Platform?
FAQ.content3: It‚Äôs simple! Visit our website, choose the course that suits you, and create your account in minutes. A free session awaits you to get started.
FAQ.questions4: Does the platform offer technical support or educational consultations?
FAQ.content4: Absolutely. Our support team is always available to assist you, and we offer guidance to help you choose the right path for your development.
FAQ.questions5: How do I choose the right level for my child?
FAQ.content5: Reach out to us, and we‚Äôll provide a placement test for any course you need.

term.title: Terms of Use
term.introduction: Welcome to our educational platform. These terms define the rules and conditions governing the use of the platform and its educational services. Please read them carefully before using the platform. By using it, you agree to be bound by these terms.
term.platform: Platform: Refers to the website that provides access to courses and educational content.
term.user: User: Anyone who registers or uses the platform's services, whether as a learner or instructor.
term.services: Services: Includes all educational and interactive features offered by the platform.
term.content: Content: All materials and information created, uploaded, or shared through the platform by users or the platform itself.
term.registration: Registration: Users must provide accurate and truthful information when creating their accounts.
term.responsibility: Responsibility: Users are responsible for keeping their account information confidential and not sharing it with others.
term.legal_use: Legal Use: It is prohibited to use the platform for any illegal or harmful activities.
term.ownership: Ownership: All rights related to the platform, its content, and services belong to us or our licensed partners.
term.personal_use: Personal Use: The platform is for personal educational use only. Redistributing content for commercial purposes is not allowed.
term.disclaimer: Disclaimer: We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the platform.
term.modifications: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted here, and continued use of the platform implies acceptance.
term.contact_us: For any questions or comments regarding the terms of use, please contact us at

privacy.title: Introduction:
privacy.introduction: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and share data when you use our educational platform.
privacy.personal_information: When registering, we may ask for personal details like your name, email, phone number, and password.
privacy.usage_data: We collect information about how you use the platform, such as the courses you join and the activities you complete.
privacy.service_provision: Providing Services: We use your data to create your account and offer technical support.
privacy.platform_improvement: Improving the Platform: We analyze usage data to enhance your experience and develop our services.
privacy.communication: Communication: We may contact you with platform updates or responses to your inquiries.
privacy.service_providers: Service Providers: We may share your data with trusted providers who help operate our platform, such as cloud hosting services.
privacy.data_security: We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or deletion.
privacy.title1: Request access to your personal data.
privacy.title3: Request deletion of your data from our system.
privacy.title4: Object to automated decisions based on your data.
privacy.text1: We reserve the right to update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions about this policy, feel free to reach out.
